title_advert: ['Lagoon | Royal Residence | Fully Furnished']
location1: ['Jumeirah Zabeel SarayDubai, Palm Jumeirah, The Crescent']
amenities: ['Furnished\nCentral A/C']
descriptions:
['DescriptionGulf Sothebys International Realty is pleased to offer you this unique luxury 5br  villa with a 2-level open terrace, fitness room and facilities for servants
The villa is located on the shores of the Arabian Gulf in a magnificent lagoon on Palm Jumeirah with a tropical garden, with direct access to a 250-meter pool and a private beach. Villa is fully furnished, equipped, ready for living. Built using the best materials (exquisite marble, dark wood, gold leaf, exterior ceramics, teak, the famous chandeliers Dotzauer and Lobmeier, Italian fresco). Villa has its own fully equipped fitness room, two large terraces on two levels. Lower teak terrace with rain shower and direct pool access. A staircase leads to a spacious upper terrace in the shade of a teak pergola. At each level there is a seating area with sun loungers and a dining area overlooking the lagoon with a tropical garden. Elegant spacious dining and living room with parquet floor, bedrooms with a  hammam style bathrooms, fitted wardrobes and balconies. In addition, the villa has rooms for maids with laundry. Air conditioning with control panel in each zone. Garage for two cars.
Owners receive privileged access to five-star service, as well as to the whole world of Jumeirah: discounts at all hotels, world-famous restaurants and bars, Talise Ottoman Spa, state-of-the-art gym, water sports, tennis courts,  luxurious park, 8 restaurants, 24-hour villa service, security, reception, concierge, valet service.
Location: Royal Residences, Palm Jumeirah, Dubai. Dubai Airport is 45 minutes away; to DIFC 30 min.
Contact Gulf Sothebys International Realty today for private viewing of this extraordinary property.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionWe are pleased to offer you this fantastic 3 bedroom + study apartment in "La Cote", at the prestigious waterfront community of Port de La Mer, by Meraas.\xa0
Port de La Mer is the first freehold master community in Jumeirah 1, located at the tip of the North Peninsula at La Mer, an eclectic and lively waterfront destination.
This particular unit offers you a privileged location within the community, with a large terrace, full marina views, and close proximity to your private beach!
At Port de La Mer you will enjoy modern architecture with a range of world-class amenities, including large swimming pools, gyms, a private beach, and a marina.
Building podiums and bridges in Port de La Mer will allow residents to move freely through open spaces, while controlled vehicle access will ensure a safe playing environment for children.\xa0
Fashionable boutiques, restaurants, cafes, and a combination of 4-star and 5-star resort will make this one of the most unique and desirable communities in Dubai.
Inspired in the Mediterranean coastline, Port de La Mer will include a stunning collection of low-rise buildings offering a stylish waterfront lifestyle.
Contact Gulf Sotheby's International Realty today for your private viewing of this extraordinary project.']

title_advert: ['Full Sea View | Aquamarine | Study | Mid Floor']
['Bespoke and Internationally Interior Designed']
location1: ['Al Naseem Residences CAbu Dhabi, Al Raha Beach, Al Bandar']
descriptions: ['DescriptionThis is a rare opportunity to purchase a bespoke internationally interior designed three bedroom apartment at Al Bandar. Open the door and step into a sophisticated life style with genuine WOW factor. Floor to ceiling glass captures maximum natural light throughout, whilst offering breathtaking endless water views from both the living areas and all bedrooms. The design concept adriotly enhances the waterfront location with the colour palate drawn from sand and sea creating a relaxing indoor/outdoor flow. \xa0Moving outside allows you to appreciate that balconies dont come any bigger than this at Al Bandar. This apartment features the largest kitchen available within these units providing ample working surfaces and storage. A spectacularly commissioned splash back adds a unique feature to this space. Beautifully appointed the powder room completes this open plan living zone.The three bedrooms are separated from the lounge by a door to ensure maximum privacy between the two areas. From this point on the sense of luxury and homeliness are maintained by wall to wall pure NZ wool carpet and plush underlay. Each of the bedrooms are tastefully designed with their own perspective. The first bedroom is decorated with a 3D wall paper and one off paint colour designed specifically for this home. The second bedroom benefits from a custom made daybed (included in the apartment). Retreating to the end of the corridor is the master bedroom with en suite bathroom which has been renovated to include a walk in shower.The apartment is presented for sale with many luxury upgrades and is ready to move in. Viewing is highly recommended for those looking for a place to call home, a home that will impress and stand out from the rest.Properties of this pedigree dont stay on the market for long. Please call to arrange a viewing.']

Offering Riviera-style living in a modern aesthetic setting, Dubai Marina by Emaar is one of the first and largest of its kind waterfront developments in the region. With a total development area of 50 million sq ft, Dubai Marina has a large canal spanning 3.5 km offering access to the sea from both ends.
Dubai Marina features several high-rises with luxury apartments as well as villas set against the backdrop of the Marina. With yachts moored along the Marina and some of the city’s best dining, entertainment and leisure facilities, Dubai Marina is the first choice for the stylish and sophisticated.
Dubai Marina comprises ten districts each developed as a distinct community. The Dubai Marina Walk, which lines the waterfront, has a selection of cosmopolitan restaurants............................................................................................................']
